description: This file defines data models related to user reviews and ratings within the application. It includes enums, data classes, and helper methods associated with reviews, review targets, drafts, updates, and aggregate ratings.

classes.name: ReviewTargetType
classes.description: An enum class representing the entity (restaurant or menu item) a review pertains to.

classes.name: ReviewTarget
classes.description: A data class representing a review's target, including its type and identifier, with a method to generate a stable key.

classes.name: Review
classes.description: A data class representing a user review, including metadata, with a method to retrieve the review's target.

classes.name: ReviewDraft
classes.description: A data class used for creating a new review draft before it's persisted.

classes.name: ReviewUpdate
classes.description: A data class for specifying updates to an existing review.

classes.name: RatingAggregate
classes.description: A data class representing aggregated rating data, including average rating and count.

methods.name: stableKey
methods.description: Generates a stable string key for identifying a review target, combining the type and id.

methods.name: target
methods.description: Returns the ReviewTarget corresponding to this review.
